pr_title: Allow using configured S3 credentials with IAM role

timeline.bodyText: You don't need to change this, but Splitter on : limit 2 is much simpler.
timeline.author: dain

timeline.message:
Allow using configured S3 credentials with IAM role

Previously, IAM roles could only be used with the default
provider chain (typically, EC2 instance credentials).

Allow using configured S3 credentials with IAM role
